A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst movie of the franchise. Complete spits on everything before it and rendered all the events of the OT and PT utterly meaningless. Which would be fine if it was for a good reason\, but it wasn't. The only reason seems to be to keep the money making status quo and play off nostalgia and keep raking in the dough as the cost of a even half decent story. Just terrible. Pretty\, but terrible.
